lead_paragraph: Mike Kelly retired Tuesday after 27 years as coach at Dayton. Kelly compiled a 246-54-1 record for an .819 winning percentage, fourth-best among coaches with at least 25 years of experience. Rick Chamberlin, the defensive coordinator, will take over as head coach, Athletic Director Ted Kissell said. Kelly will remain at the university, expanding his duties as an associate athletic director.
